content: It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go, instead, where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
author: Max Planck

content: There are no failures. Just experiences and your reactions to them.
author: Tom Krause

content: Nothing but heaven itself is better than a friend who is really a friend.
author: Plautus

content: Begin, be bold, and venture to be wise.
author: Horace

content: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

content: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
author: Leo Tolstoy

content: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer
